subject: Re: [Junit-devel] Throwing exception
msgSnippet: [bcc: junit-devel, +junit@yahoogroups.com] Anil, 1) Mocking frameworks like jMock are useful for just this kind of interaction testing. 2) Questions about the
messageBody:
[bcc: junit-devel, +junit@yahoogroups.com]

Anil,

1) Mocking frameworks like jMock are useful for just this kind of
interaction testing.
2) Questions about the use of junit are better asked on the user list
(junit@yahoogroups.com).

Good luck,

David Saff

On Sun, Oct 12, 2008 at 11:44 PM, <anil.kurian@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Can we throw an exception to the main class from my test class?
> We have a few catch statements in our main class, to test them we need to
> send those exceptions from test class, so is there any way?
>
>
> Regards,
> Anil
